message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with advanced features that can significantly enhance your operations or personal use. Considering its exceptional quality and capabilities, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Let's start with an offer of $20000 for the product.

I appreciate the features and quality of the product, but I'm on a tight budget. I'm willing to pay $15000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the market value and my budget constraints.
